codegeex.login.title: CodeGeeX: Login
codegeex.interactive.title: CodeGeeX: Interactive mode
codegeex.disable-enable.title: CodeGeeX: Disable or enable CodeGeeX
codegeex.translation.title: CodeGeeX: Translation mode
codegeex.candidate-num.title: CodeGeeX Candidate Number
codegeex.candidate-num.description: The candidate list of code. The more the slower the inference.
codegeex.completion-delay.description: The delay in seconds to start getting completions without new change in the editor. You can change this value to get better experience in coding with our extension and to avoid some unuseful completion suggestions.
codegeex.decoding.temp.description: Temp controls the randomness of output, range: [0.01, 1]. Higher temperature means more randomness, and the model will return creative results.
codegeex.decoding.topp.description: Top-p keeps the candidate tokens whose probabilities sum to p, range [0, 1]. Top-p=0 means disabled.
codegeex.decoding.topk.description: Top-k keeps the k candidate tokens with the highest probabilities, range [0, 40]. Top-k=0 means disabled.
codegeex.disable-for.description:
DisabledFor is a list of specific languages that will be disabled temporarily for the extension, you can set manully language* as the key and then set the value true to disable a language or false to re-enable it settings (this will need to restart vscode) or do this by clicking icon in the status bar.
* *language should be a valid vscode language id, like python, shellscript, csharp, objective-cpp and etc.* You can click the language option in status bar to find the list and language ids are in the parentheses.
codegeex.enable-extension.description: Check this if you want to enable stealth mode of the extension.
codegeex.language-preference.title: Language Preference
codegeex.chat.language-preference.descri: Configure the language for chat replies.
codegeex.chat.fontsize.description: Controls the font size in pixels
codegeex.generation-preference.descripti: You can choose the preference when generating code. If you choose automatic, the extension will generate whether a block or a line depending on your input. If you choose line by line, the extension will generate a code line, a comment line or a code line and a comment line for you each time.
codegeex.only-key-control.description: Check this if you want to get suggestions only in need by pressing alt/option+\ in stealth mode.
codegeex.privacy.description: Accept sharing the generated code only for research purposes to make CodeGeeX better. Otherwise, the code won't be stored and is only used to assist your programming.
codegeex.survey.description: This is decided by if you have chosen to make a survey. If you want to make the survey again, you can click the link: [survey](https://wj.qq.com/s2/11260705/6cd6/)/[问卷](https://wj.qq.com/s2/11259178/fd49/)
codegeex.use-similar-file-for-prompt.des: You can config this to control if a possible file content will be add to the prompt when you send request to our model.
codegeex.review.title: Use CodeGeeX for Code Review
codegeex.ask.title: CodeGeeX: Submit
codegeex.completion.setting.title: Completion Settings
codegeex.filling-model.description: Configure which model to use for code completion.
codegeex.askcodegeex.tests.title: Generate Tests
codegeex.askcodegeex.title: Ask CodeGeeX
codegeex.askcodegeex.explain.title: Explain Code
codegeex.askcodegeex.fix.title: Fix Bug
codegeex.askcodegeex.comment.title: Generate Comment
codegeex.ghostComment.title: Ghost Comment
codegeex.ghostComment.hide.title: Hide Ghost Comment
codegeex.git.commit.title: Generate Commit Message, language and style can be adjusted in settings.
codegeex.git.commit.description: Generate Commit Message, language and style can be adjusted in settings.
codegeex.git.commit.style.conv: Generating case according to Conventional Commits
codegeex.terminal.ask.title: Ask CodeGeeX to explain
codegeex.local-mode.title: Local Mode
codegeex.local-mode.description: Configure your local model here. Refer to the [Local Mode documentation](https://zhipu-ai.feishu.cn/wiki/DAtfwkaqniX9erkxvIScCkSonKh) for configuration tutorial.
codegeex.local-mode.apiurl.description: Please enter the complete model address (Endpoint) here. Refer to the [Local Mode documentation](https://zhipu-ai.feishu.cn/wiki/DAtfwkaqniX9erkxvIScCkSonKh) for configuration tutorial.
codegeex.local-mode.chatglm.description: If you want to use the GLM series models from Zhipu AI for chat and completion, you can set the following parameters.
codegeex.local-mode.chatglm.apikey.descr: You can configure Zhipu's API Key here.
codegeex.local-mode.chatglm.model.descri: Enter the model name you need to use.
codegeex.local-mode.chat.parameters.desc: Here you can adjust the prompt words of the model for chat, customize the output style and effect, or choose the default effect that we have tuned. Please note that custom effects may not guarantee the best experience, so please choose carefully.
codegeex.local-mode.completions.paramete: Here you can adjust the prompt words of the model for completions, customize the output style and effect, or choose the default effect that we have tuned. Please note that custom effects may not guarantee the best experience, so please choose carefully.
codegeex.local-mode.temperature.descript: Sampling temperature between 0 and 1. Higher values (e.g., 0.7) make the output more random, while lower values (e.g., 0.2) make it more focused and deterministic.
codegeex.local-mode.top_p.description: The parameter top_p ranges from 0 to 1. The model only considers tokens with cumulative probability until top_p. So, 0.1 means considering only the top 10% of tokens with high cumulative probability. It is not recommended to change both top_p and temperature.
codegeex.local-mode.max_tokens.descripti: The maximum number of tokens to generate for code completion.
codegeex.local-mode.presence_penalty.des: Penalty for presence, ranging from -2.0 to 2.0. Positive values penalize the model for generating new tokens already present in the text, increasing the likelihood of the model discussing new topics (we recommend 0.3 for a suitable effect).
codegeex.workspace.setting.title: Repository Index
codegeex.workspace.setting.description: Once enabled, we will automatically create a knowledge index for your codebase, which helps improve the quality of Q&A and code completion. We support setting up ignore rules to prevent the plugin from automatically reading sensitive files (see [guide](https://zhipu-ai.feishu.cn/wiki/AWgfwq5YniIfyqk7WNRctXCUnYe)). The index results are only used to provide context for your Q&A and code completion, not for training. Enabling this option signifies your acceptance of the [Privacy Agreement](https://codegeex.cn/privacypolicy).
codegeex.authorization.title: License Configuration
codegeex.authorization.license.title: License
codegeex.authorization.license.descripti: Please contact your teacher or administrator to obtain the license.
codegeex.authorization.license.patternEr: Please enter a valid license key
codegeex.explorer.projectMap.title: View Workspace in Diagram
codegeex.codelens.configuration.title: Code Lens
codegeex.codelens.configuration.enableme: Enable Code Lens for quick operations on methods and classes within editor
codegeex.codelens.configuration.hide_x.d: Show quick operations but hide "X" symbol
codegeex.codelens.configuration.function: Select the quick actions you want to appear at the top of the method
codegeex.codelens.configuration.class.de: Select the quick actions you want to appear at the top of the class
codegeex.ghostComment.auto.title: Ghost Comment(Auto)
codegeex.ghostComment.inAutoMode.title: Ghost Comment(Auto) ✓
codegeex.editor.fileUML.title: View in Diagram
